Class IntegerValueConverter

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.ValueConverter
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.IntegerValueConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String>
public class IntegerValueConverter
extends ValueConverter

Handles conversion of integer values in decimal, hexadecimal (0x...), octal (\\0...), binary (n...) form.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

public boolean doSupportsSeparator()
Description copied from class: ValueConverter

The default implementation returns false.

getNumberFormat

public ValueConverter.NumberFormat getNumberFormat()
Query the number format in which numbers should be shown in the GUI.

If doSupportsNumberFormat() is false this value should be ignored else it should be considered in doConvertToView(String).

Overrides:
getNumberFormat in class ValueConverter
Returns:
the numberFormat in which numbers are shown in the table
Since:
